body: Can anyone tell me how it ends I tried reading this but I just cannot read this it makes me sad lol

scratch the censoring part for part 1 and 2. I'm dumb.

@soontace According to uploader on exhentai, some stuff life better background have been added. 

This is only from what I've seen, but part 1 and 2 (the vanilla, and the original massage > orgy scene) aren't mosaic censored anymore, but rather black line censored, which is much better imo.

Part 3, where they wear their swimsuits has a bit more censoring than it's solo counterpart.

If you're downloading, this one and Yaribeya are probably the only ones you need.
